long_description: Lightweight, stretchy and weather-resistant, the ExOfficio Borocade jacket keeps you comfortable in cool, variable weather; it's ideal for travel or everyday errands. Flexible, breathable nylon/spandex fabic resists stains and light rain thanks to a Durable Water Repellent treatment. Brushed interior has a soft, fleecy texture; microfleece-lined collar adds warmth. Internal travel pocket system keeps your passport, boarding pass and other necessities organized and within easy reach. Zippered handwarmer pockets and zippered chest pocket. ExOfficio Boracade jacket features an adjustable drawcord hem and adjustable rip-and-stick cuffs; droptail hem adds extra coverage in the back. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight, stretchy and weather-resistant, the ExOfficio Borocade jacket keeps you comfortable in cool, variable weather; it's ideal for travel or everyday errands.
